name: Dr. Death
plot: The terrifying true story of Dr. Christopher Duntsch, a flourishing Dallas neurosurgeon whose patients suddenly begin becoming permanently maimed or dead. As victims piled up, two fellow physicians set out to stop him.

episodes.plot: Two doctors investigate the maiming and death of patients at the hands of a Dallas neurosurgeon.
episodes.title: Diplos

episodes.plot: Henderson and Kirby try to strip Duntsch of his medical license; Duntsch joins the football team.
episodes.title: Ain't No Bum

episodes.plot: Duntsch meets his mentor; Henderson and Kirby explore the medical system.
episodes.title: Dock Ellis

episodes.plot: Henderson and Kirby crash a function in Duntsch's honor; Duntsch sets up his practice in Texas.
episodes.title: An Occurrence at Randall Kirby's Sink

episodes.plot: Duntsch begins operating in Dallas; Henderson and Kirby gain an ally in stopping Duntsch.
episodes.title: The ---- in the Bed

episodes.plot: Duntsch attempts to fix a disastrous surgery; Shughart builds her case against Duntsch.
episodes.title: Occam's Razor

episodes.plot: Duntsch tries to mount a defense; Henderson, Kirby and Shughart seek answers to lingering questions.
episodes.title: Feet of Clay

episodes.plot: Duntsch's victims confront him as Henderson, Kirby and Shughart set out to put him behind bars.
episodes.title: Hardwood Floors
